title: Drawn to You: Volume 1
description: Your whole world can change in a single moment—a reckless moment where you let go of your inhibitions and you lose control.I pride myself on never losing control, but somehow, I did with her.It started with a promise. It grew with a kiss. And it ended in heartbreak.My name is Tristan Knight and this is my story. I’m not your average New York millionaire. In fact, when this story begins I am nothing to no one except her. My best friend’s little sister—the light among the darkness.
author: Vanessa Booke
